title: Disney's DuckTales: The Gold Odyssey
description: Presenting an epic feature-length DuckTales adventure by Bob Langhans (Battle of the Planets), back in print for the first time since 1991! A battle with Arctic poachers leads Scrooge and Launchpad to the discovery of highly unearthly gold nuggets... and a chase into space after an 84-karat asteroid! The treasure hunt would be tough enough without McDuck enemy Flintheart Glomgold horning in on it too... uh-oh!
author: Bob Langhans
